exec: pm.test("Response status follows RESTful conventions (collection-level)", function () {
// Use tolerant 2xx ranges by default; override with stricter per-request tests when necessary

request.description: Retrieve a list of invoices for the current user or tenant. Supports pagination and filters.
Create a new invoice (receipt) in the system. Expected success: 201 Created.
Alias of 'Get Invoices' used for a different test case or parameter set.
Retrieve a single invoice by its identifier, including items and metadata.
Updates a specific invoice in the system. Expected success: 202 Accepted.
Delete an invoice by its identifier. May be a soft delete depending on backend behavior.
Apply a partial update to specific fields of an existing invoice.
List product/items associated with the specified invoice.
Add a new product/item to the specified invoice.
Remove a named product or item from the invoice by identifier or name.
Repeat/variant of 'Get Invoice Products' used for additional test coverage.
Alternate payload variant for creating an invoice product.
Update fields of an existing invoice product (quantity, price, metadata).
Another GET variant to validate product listing after modifications.
Alternate path to fetch invoice details (duplicate test case).
Fetch the merchant entity associated with the invoice.
Disassociate or remove the merchant linked to the invoice.
Adds a merchant to an invoice in the system. Expected success: 201 Created.
Duplicate/variant of 'Get Invoice’s Merchant' for test coverage.
Additional variant for merchant retrieval to validate edge cases.
Retrieve the scanned document/resource (image/pdf) for an invoice.
Creates a new invoice scan in the system. Expected success: 201 Created.
Variant of scan retrieval for idempotence and caching checks.
Updates a specific invoice scan in the system. Expected success: 202 Accepted.
Additional retrieval variant of invoice scan resource.
Deletes a specific invoice scan from the system. Expected success: 204 No Content.
Fetch additional metadata (free-form key/value) for the invoice.
Patches the metadata from a specific invoice in the system. Expected success: 202 Accepted.
Duplicate variant for invoice metadata retrieval.
Deletes specific metadata keys from a specific invoice in the system. Expected success: 204 No Content.
Extra variant to validate metadata endpoints under different conditions.
Another invoice retrieval variant used in different test scenarios.
Yet another GET invoice variant for load/consistency checks.
Variant of product listing to exercise different code paths.
Additional product-listing test to validate pagination and sorting.
Extra scan retrieval test used in larger workflows.
Another listing variant to validate filtering and edge cases.
Retrieve a list of merchants for the current user or tenant.
Creates a new merchant in the system. Expected success: 201 Created.
Alternate merchant listing call used for variant testing.
Retrieve details of a merchant identified by merchantIdentifier.
Updates a specific merchant in the system. Expected success: 202 Accepted.
Additional merchant retrieval variant for test coverage.
Fetch products across invoices for a merchant to analyze merchant-level inventory.
Deletes a specific merchant from the system. Expected success: 204 No Content.
Another merchant listing variant to test edge conditions.
